title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
description: An alternative cover edition for this ISBN can be found hereShe was a schoolmistress with a difference. Proud, cultured, romantic, her ideas were progressive, even shocking. And when she decided to transform a group of young girls under her tutelage into the 'creme de la creme' of Marcia Blaine school, no one could have predicted the outcome.
author: Muriel Spark
